mapper.insert: insert into BI_WAREHOUSE (ID, WAREHOUSEID, WAREHOUSENAME, STATUS, OWNERSHIPUNITS, REGISTEREDCAPITAL, INVESTMENTAMOUNT, ADDRESS, COORDINATE, ENVIRONMENTAL, RANK, TESTCONDITIONS, AGREEMENTDATE, PROVINCE, CITY, POSTCODE, CORPORATEREPRESENTATIVE, REPRESENTATIVEPHONE, CONTACTMAN, PHONE, MOBILE, FAX, HASDOCK, DOCKTONNAGE, DOCKDAILYTHROUGHPUT, SHIPTYPE, HASRAILWAY, RAILWAYDAILYTHROUGHPUT, HASTANKER, TANKERDAILYTHROUGHPUT, CREATETIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ownershipunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{investmentamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{environmental,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{testconditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporaterepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representativephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasdock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{docktonnage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dockdailythroughput,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shiptype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hasrailway,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{railwaydailythroughput,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hastanker,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tankerdailythroughput,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update BI_WAREHOUSE set WAREHOUSEID = #{warehouseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSENAME = #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OWNERSHIPUNITS = #{ownershipunits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTEREDCAPITAL = #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVESTMENTAMOUNT = #{investmentamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COORDINATE = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENVIRONMENTAL = #{environmental,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TESTCONDITIONS = #{testconditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENTDATE = #{agreementdate,jdbcType=DATE}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPORATEREPRESENTATIVE = #{corporaterepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPRESENTATIVEPHONE = #{representativephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACTMAN = #{contactman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HASDOCK = #{hasdock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DOCKTONNAGE = #{docktonnage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DOCKDAILYTHROUGHPUT = #{dockdailythroughput,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHIPTYPE = #{shiptype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HASRAILWAY = #{hasrailway,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RAILWAYDAILYTHROUGHPUT = #{railwaydailythroughput,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HASTANKER = #{hastanker,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TANKERDAILYTHROUGHPUT = #{tankerdailythroughput,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
